1.召喚士の指輪は 光に包まれて消えた！: Summoner's Ring vanished in a flash of light!

2.「私は……ずっと……| ずっとずっと…… つらかったんだ……。: I... have... been... hard... on myself for a|long, long time...

3.「お前は 本当に いい奴だから…… | 私は 私自身の みにくい 妬みの感情を|: Because you're a really good guy... I had to|suppress my own ugly feelings of envy... I had|to...

4.「わ 私は……グガ…… もう限界だった……| オマエの才能の前で わ 私のドリョ: I... gah.. had reached my limit... in front|of your talent. I was... pointless...|confronted... with... a gah...

5.「コッ コノ 宝珠と…… ワタシの召喚術デ…… | はジメて 超えられると思ッタ: With the pearl and my summoning technique, you|think you can beat me!? Don't even try.

6.「オマエニ……グゲッ ソバニイル ニンゲンノ| イタミガ ワカル ハズガ ナイィ: YOU! YOU! YOU! GAH! YOU! YOU!!!

10.「ハァ……ハァ……| 邪法に手を染めても……ついに| お前を 超えることは でき: *Huff* *Huff* All of the evil in the world|could not even get the better of you..

11.「私は お前に友情を感じる反面 その才能を| 心底うらやんでいた……その 怪物の: I felt friendship for you, but I also envied|your talent so deeply that I couldn't help but|feel like a monster...

12.「私のしたことが 許されるとは思っていない。 | だが これでもう 罪を重ねなく: I don't expect you to forgive me for what I|did. But I guess I don't have to repeat my|sins anymore... thank you..

15.……中央塔の最上層で 見たものは|今までにないくらい 凶悪な魔人と融合して|怪物: ...I saw on the top floor of the center tower|the most vicious Demon Linjara I've ever seen,|fused with a monster.

16.これ以上 被害を出させないために|俺は アイツもろとも この時空の狭間に|転移す: In order to prevent further damage, I had no|choice but to transfer myself and him to this|Spacetime Gap.

17.アイツは 俺やエテーネへの憎悪をさけびながら|襲いかかってきた。戦いは何日も続き: He attacked me, screaming his hatred for me|and Ethene. The battle went on for days, and|we fought to the Limits Beyond Limits.

18.思えばこれが 初めてのケンカだったな。|いつ倒されても おかしくない状況だったが:
Thinking back, this was our first fight. It|was a situation where I could have been|killed at any moment, but during that|
|time, I wonder if we were having fun...

19.最後には アイツも どこか清々しい表情で|君と 全力で戦うことができて よかった:
In the end, he looked somewhat refreshed and|said he was glad he could fight with me with|all his strength... and passed away as if|
|he was asleep.

20.俺は もう 全てのチカラを使い果たして|ここから戻ることは できそうにないが……: I've used up all my energy and I'm not sure|I'll ever come back from this, but if I saved|his soul, I'll be happy with that.

21.ただ ひとつだけ 心残りなのは……|お前の成長を 見守れないことだ。: My only regret is that I won't be able to|watch you grow up.

22.だから せめて この想いを|結晶に込めて 送ろうと思う。: So I'm going to at least put this thought into|crystals and send them to you.

24.我が子 <pc>よ……|この世界を愛し 強く生きろ。|お前が よき友に 出会える: My child <pc>... love this world and|live strong. I hope you find a good friend.
